page.title: 18SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: The Plessey factory is part of an international manufacturing company.Our Plessey factory makes and assembles Electronic Telephone Exchanges.Parts are made here.The staff are skilled in support services.The TXE4 Exchange also offers interface facilities with computers to transfer information quickly. Other areas in which Plessey are involved in research and develop- ment are* l. Army defence systems 2. Aircraft and Missile Defence. Multipart is an International Centre for the distribution of parts for Leyland Bus and Trucks.Their computer Action Terminal system(CATS) gives 24 hour delivery service.A customer orders his part from distributorwho passes the order to Multipart.Computer shows availability cost,prints invoices and displays outstanding accounts..
